subject: nmTeam account registration email verification
title: nmTeam account registration email verification
para_tks: Thank you for registering an nmTeam account. Please click the button below to verify your email and continue the registration process.
para_backup: If you are unable to click the button to complete the verification, please open this page in your browser to complete the registration.
para_why: You received this email because you are registering for an nmTeam account.
para_measure: If you did not apply for an nmTeam account, please ignore this email.
